# Darwhin Gomez

New York, New York  
347-491-2955  
Darwhin88@gmail.com  
[LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/darwhin)  
[GitHub](https://github.com/dw8888)  

## EDUCATION
**City University of New York – School of Professional Studies**  
Master of Science – Data Science and Machine Learning, GPA 4.0, Expected Jan 2026  

**City University of New York – New York City College of Technology**  
Bachelor of Technology – Computer Information Systems, GPA 3.78, Jun 2024  
Dean’s List (5x), National Honor Society  

## CERTIFICATIONS  
- AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Associate  
- AWS Certified AI Practitioner – Generative AI  
- Google Cybersecurity Certificate  

## PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE  
**Solutions Architect Intern**  
Amazon Web Services (AWS), Arlington, VA (Remote/Hybrid)  
Jun 2025 – Sep 2025  
- Designed and presented secure, scalable AWS architectures for enterprise customers.  
- Built POCs combining Bedrock LLMs with Athena/Glue/Lambda analytics to deliver actionable sentiment insights.  
- Automated a sentiment-analysis pipeline processing 1M+ records and surfaced real-time QuickSight dashboards.  
- Fine-tuned models in SageMaker using instruction training, improving accuracy by ~5% and reducing toxicity by ~8%.  

**Software Developer Intern**  
WOPLLI Technologies, Remote, NY  
Jun 2024 – Sep 2024  
- Designed a Virtual Credential System for decentralized identity ecosystems.  
- Configured and tested Azure cloud environments for application hosting and deployment.  
- Developed API integration and testing scripts using Postman.  

**IT Support Intern**  
Mayor’s Office of Information Services, New York, NY  
Feb 2024 – May 2024  
- Automated troubleshooting workflows via Python scripts to reduce manual workload.  
- Supported VIP users with secure access (Active Directory, VPN, VOIP).  

**IT Instructor Assistant**  
RF CUNY & Generation USA, Remote, NY  
Feb 2022 – Aug 2023  
- Delivered 36 lessons covering IT support, Linux, PowerShell, and scripting for 200+ learners.  
- Maintained a 96% cohort graduation rate through data-driven instruction.  

## TECHNICAL PROJECTS  
**Alfred – Personal Agentic Job Search Assistant**  
- Designed and developed a personal agentic job search assistant using FastAPI and OpenAI GPT-4.1 for automated resume and cover letter generation.  
- Implemented a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system using PostgreSQL to store and retrieve personal work data.  
- Established a CI/CD pipeline and Docker deployment for the FastAPI server and database.  

## TECHNICAL SKILLS  
- **Programming Languages:** Python (pandas, scikit-learn, PyTorch), SQL, R, Java, JavaScript  
- **Cloud Technologies:** AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS, DynamoDB, Glue, QuickSight, SageMaker)  
- **Data Analysis & Machine Learning:** Statistical Analysis, Regression, Classification Techniques, Neural Networks  
- **Automation & CI/CD:** Git, Docker  

## LANGUAGES  
- English (Fluent)  
- Spanish (Fluent)  

## PROFESSIONAL COMMUNITIES  
- Society of Hispanic Professional Engineers  
- NYC HackR – Data & AI Meetup Community  
- CUNY SPS AI Club
